abstract: NBA Roundup; Dallas Mavericks defeat Brooklyn Nets, 119-118; other professional basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Dallas Mavericks earned a 119-118 road victory over the Nets on Wednesday night, which marked Dirk Nowitzki’s move into sixth place on the N.B.A.’s career scoring list.

headline.main: Dirk Nowitzki Moves Up Scoring List and Downs the Nets
headline.print_headline: Nowitzki Moves Up Scoring List and Downs the Nets

snippet: The Dallas Mavericks earned a 119-118 road victory over the Nets on Wednesday night, which marked Dirk Nowitzki’s move into sixth place on the N.B.A.’s career scoring list.
